cu.explanation_en: Setting the tracking area code to a negative value -1 will cause invalid TAC configuration and network registration failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the preamble received target power to an excessively high value of 100 dBm will cause invalid RACH configuration and preamble detection failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將前導接收目標功率設定為過高的 100 dBm 值會導致無效的 RACH 配置，並造成前導檢測失敗。
